website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice if you’re looking for a larger grill that burns hot yet uses little charcoal.
pros: We love how this option burns very hot with about a third of the charcoal you’re used to using
A sturdy grill that is easy to assemble and use
cons: Food is so close to the charcoal that this grill can be difficult to use for anything other than searing
Cooking grate can be hard to clean

website_summaries.verdict: Easy assembly and sturdy build are plus points, as is the hinged lid with locking feature. Leaks in heavy rain, so using a cover is a must.
pros: Good-size, 360-square-inch cooking surface with porcelain-coated grates
Charcoal grill heats quickly with just a few briquettes, and temperature is easy to maintain
Assembly takes less than an hour
cons: Grill cover is needed for outside storage to avoid rust
Space is a premium in the heating section of the grill, with only a single layer of charcoal fitting beneath the cooking grate and no height adjustment available

website_summaries.verdict: A simple and effective mobile porcelain-coated cooking grate, with latch down lid for extra-safe transportation.
pros: This grill stands our for its TRU-Infrared cooking system, which makes for balanced cooking and more control over your grill
No-fall-through porcelain cooking grate helps prevent flare-ups
Hinged lid props up, freeing your hands for ultimate burger flipping
Lid-mounted temperature gauge helps monitor overall heat
cons: Tends to be hard to clean the grate after use

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this grill,and I really did for the first season, cooks very nicely, no flare up. Nice design, burns fast and long, best grill I've ever used for grilling vegetables. Here's the problem; the grate is ceramic coated,it needs to be cleaned differently than other grills, I cleaned it according to the manual, but with use, the ceramic started to chip and flake here and there, eventually it rusted, "no big deal, I'll just buy another grate" , sorry, out of stock! Has been for a while now,(over a year). And this grill only works as advertised with the right grate. Buy something else, I wish I had
customer_reviews.author: william s seitz jr

customer_reviews.title: A solid grill for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This grill gets much hotter, faster than my old grill. They aren't lying when they save it saves you charcoal. It was quick and easy to assemble. The directions are very clear, and the parts come labelled and separated for you on a shrink-wrapped bit of cardboard. All of the parts look solid, well made, and well designed. It's awkward to roll around because the only handle is on the lid. There also isn't much room between the coal rack and the cooking rack; you basically get one layer of charcoal. Since it does use less charcoal, that's not really an issue, but it would be nice if you could vary the distance between the fire and the food.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift and they absolutely love this grill. I had also purchased stainless steel screws, nuts and bolts due to others reviews. He said it only took about 15 minutes to put together; his wife assisted. They made barbacued chicken today, and it was truely delicious. Clean up was easy. Only selected four stars because of replacing screws, etc. Would highly reccommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: It'll cook your food.
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. I've had for for about 2 months and cook on it at least twice a week. Took a while to get the hang of the heat distribution, this grill gets much hotter with a lot less coal than most grills I've used. Works super well now that I've got the hang of it. Plenty of space to cook for a buttload of people, too.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Oblivious

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely awesome grill. I seldom write reviews, but I am very impressed with this piece of equipment. It cooks my steaks perfectly, like a high end steakhouse. This made the best home grilled food ever and I've been grilling for decades and have owned both the Weber Kettle and several LP gas grills. At this price it's even better, though it would be worthwhile at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this grille. Pay attention to the owner's manual and placement of coals.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GRILLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new grill, it looks good and it really cooks the food great. It's also pretty easy to clean so far. You have to read and follow the directions because it isn't like other grills, but if you follow the directions it cooks the food great. The charcoals can't be bunched up in the center and you can't use too many at once. If you spread them out like instructed or place them around the edge the gill cooks fine and fast. I have not had a problem with this grill at all.
customer_reviews.author: DKWF

customer_reviews.title: It’s NOT a Weber!!! 😡You’ve been warned!!!👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: It’s NOT a Weber, bought it to replace my Weber charcoal grill. The info sounded good a I “bought” it. I have used it for a year and was unhappy every time. Not a Weber...It gets way too hot, you cannot control the heat Not a Weber... and by the time the heat comes down your charcoal is about burned out. The grill is horrible to clean. Not a Weber... The air system doesn’t work. All in all s terrible investment. It does look nice though. Get a Weber!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from my Old Smokey grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill was pretty easy to assemble. The only real challenge was the first step of getting the legs attached without a second person to help. The rest of the assembly was easy breezy. The porcelain coating on the grill and charcoal grid are nice and seem easy to clean so far. This is the perfect size for grilling for 1-4 people. I typically grill for one, so this is much easier to use than the old 30-something inch grill I had. Plus, it sits high enough that I can stand up to grill and no longer have to worry about my dogs trying to nab anything off the grill when I'm not looking.
customer_reviews.author: C Fritsche

customer_reviews.title: I love my Kettleman
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kettleman. Very easy to assemble. I've cooked steak, ribs, and burgers on this. I'm still experimenting with the right amount of charcoal, but temperature is very easy to adjust. I've had the Kettleman outside since I first got it, and it lasted Spring, Summer, and Fall outdoors and still looks as good as new. I like the durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sizzordotnet

customer_reviews.title: Bring a Steak
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get a more usable charcoal grill than what I had. Considered the Weber and decided to save a few bucks and go withe the Char-Broil. It works fine and has reminded me of the advantage of charcoal over gas when cooking a steak. Still use the Weber gas grill for some other meats particularly when a quick cook is desired but not for steak. The ash catcher appears to be a better design than the Weber as it attaches directly to the kettle FWIW. This is a simple design that gets the job done, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is Time Consuming and Dirty Work
customer_reviews.text: I have owned my grill for 15 months. I have read and tried the various recommendations for slow cooking and cleanup. They just do not work satisfactorily for me. This grill is okay for grilling burgers or steaks. It is very difficult to use for slow cooking or smoking. Due to the design of the grill surface, it gets dirty faster and it is very difficult and time consuming to keep clean. The design does control "flareups" but that is a small positive compared to the negatives. I moved back to a Weber and cooking on a grill has become a pleasurable experience once more.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, I've had a lot of fun with it already. The design means it does a good job at a lot of things, but you really have to be creative to control the heat on different parts of the grill. You have to plan ahead placing the hot coals, because you don't want to have to take off the hot grill grate to add or move coals. So hope you get it right the first time. This is your only means of control, the grate height is fixed. That said I have made burgers, chicken, sausage, large beef roast, whole chicken, veg, even a pizza or rwo and overall it's been a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Flex Flipperoo

customer_reviews.title: Good aroma on the food
customer_reviews.text: Assembled today. Parts clearly labeled, instructions clear. Wish there was more of a gap between the charcoal and the gate. Loaded the grill with close to 50 briquettes, was still too hot for true indirect cooking. Good aroma on the food, good grilled taste. Shrimp and scallops cooked on a perforated metal sheet on the grill came out excellent. Agree this needs a rotational sheet of metal to shut off airflow to kill coals as an added design, but overall was a good grill for the 99 it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: A Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is easy to assemble and use. It cooks beautifully with no flare-ups. There are a few ways to lay the coals out depending on how hot you want it. If I only cook for 2 people, I put a small pile in the center of the grate otherwise a put it around the circumference. You can put smoking chips in with the coals to add smoke flavor to your food. It cleans up easy too. You will love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: lvwed716

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kettle grill.
customer_reviews.text: Arrive as scheduled. Looked at other kettle grills. This is the best quality of the ones I looked at in stores. It is a great buy at $40 below big box stores. Works great if you follow instructions. I love to do pork tenderloin, it gets a great smoky flavor using lump charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: denal

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well thought out grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built and thought out grill. The venting if great, the grill grate has very little flare up and it requires less charcoal with the coals so close to the cooking surface. It's a hundred times better than my first charcoal grill that I paid about half as much for. Extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy grilling!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it is my second one i get. The first one I bought it at Lowes. Is super easy to grill on this kettle, and the best part is that you don't need too much coals to get a good cooking temperature. Ive done chicken, steaks, burgers, and also low and slow cooks like ribs, all with very good results. Highly recommend this kettle
customer_reviews.author: Ariel C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this grill for the first time and I am impressed! The grill even feels solid. I love the hinged lid and the fact that you don't need a whole lot of charcoal. Easy to use and to clean up after. The ash catcher is so simple and quick to empty and clean, much more so than my last grill. I have never owned a gas grill, but I have owned Webers. They are nice enough, acceptable, but not worth what they sell for. I am sold on the Kettleman and cannot wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Grilles every bit as good as my ceramic grill
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Grilles every bit as good as my ceramic grill. Arrived ahead of the estimated date,was easy to assemble. It's my go to grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply great..
customer_reviews.text: Simply great ... people make sure you use the charcoal grill correctly ... I used it incorrectly by placing the charcoal at the very bottom instead of placing the pieces on the charcoal grill . It's a great unit .... and I love the lift and set feature of the top, unlike the Weber grill. Quality product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Garza

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this grill works and my food never came out better. It is well made and I would by again in a heart beat. Its not as easy to clean as ad makes it sound but by making sure you oil down the grates sides and not just on the top helps a lot. Love the grill
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy - Get a Weber
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this grill for less than a year and already the grilling grate is rusted and the thermometer is broken. My 12 year old Weber is in better shape than this is. The only thing this grill does better than the Weber, is put nice grill marks on the meat.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: special design
customer_reviews.text: This bbq great at searing meats. I got it for cheap 2 years ago and its still grilling like its new. The only issue over the issues is the ash can support beam snapped off. It kind of sucks but it still works. Other then that, no issue at all. I do recommend buying the char broil cleaning brush. Its great at cleaning the deep crevices of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Larios

customer_reviews.title: Very good grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but PAY ATTENTION to which part goes where. I used 1/2 the charcoal that my 18" weber uses. After the first use, the ceramic chipped (I used the Nylon brush to clean it). I contacted Char Broil and they sent it a new cooking grate!
customer_reviews.author: John and Lori Maynard

customer_reviews.title: You will like it, I did.
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations based on the price. I was incredibly surprised. This little beauty is perfect for grilling. Gets really hot really quick. Very easy to dump the ashes. We have used it 5-6 times for steak, hamburgers, pork fillets and chicken. All turned out great. I am very mechanically challenged, barely can operate a screwdriver. I put it together with limited cursing. Strong recommendation from me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ringenberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill.
customer_reviews.text: This grill rocks. The food comes out perfect everytime. With its infrared grate, flareups are controlled. The unit is built well, with thick gauge metal. Weber is going to have a run for its money with this grill. I went back and forth between the kettleman and a weber, and i am glad i got the kettleman. Im sure if you are reading this review, and buy it, you won't regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandouble

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill, set up was about 20 minutes. Maintaining it is a breeze, easier than my propane grill since grease is tossed with the ashes. Just be sure to avoid scratching surface grates when cleaning. Use the proper material so you don't damage the porcelain coating.
customer_reviews.author: Lummus

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Works just like they advertise in their videos, uses less coal. Easy to clean and goes together fairly easily. Has more surface area than I expected. I have a vertical smoker, a barrel smoker that I converted into a large grill and this one. I expected to use the large grill for family events but I was able to just use this one for about 12 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bad boy...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in January 2016. I love it. (I'll admit I'm not a hardcore bbq'er so maybe whatever?) I highly recommend this and continue to use it today. BBQ, pizza, slow cooker etc.. good times. I'll probably buy for my old man..... welp, see ya later!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled the grill and had two issues. First, one of the small cap nuts was not threaded on the inside. Second, one of the ash support brackets wasn't threaded on one side. I called Char-Broil customer service (Saturday @ 6PM). I spoke to a very pleasant young man who quickly made an order to ship me my replacement parts. One of the best experiences I've had with this type of issue. Very pleased with the customer support i received. Now i just need to use the grill... update to come.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Legs are wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: The grill is pretty good at cooking food. I gave it two stars because the build quality is poor. The legs keep getting loose. Feels like an accident waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Won Lee

customer_reviews.title: What a great grill for the money...!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a relatively inexpensive charcoal grill for those days in which I had the time to skip the gas grill. I've always preferred the flavor of a charcoal grill over gas however I didn't want to spend a fortune on one. This grill has all of the features I need 1) Hinged lid 2) Thermometer built into the lid 3) Large ash pan on the bottom 4) An infrared cooking surface) Worth every dime I paid for it and it's produced some wonderful summer time meals.
customer_reviews.author: Moneymindr

customer_reviews.title: I love steak
customer_reviews.text: Barely ever grilled. Bought this and use it once or twice a week. Kabobs and steak all the time. This grill turns a noob like me into a fairly competent home cook ya know?
customer_reviews.author: S. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: No space between cooking grate and charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to cook on, charcoal is far to close to the cooking grate. Cooking grate has now been overheated and food just wants to stick, even after oiling. Not happy with this design at all.
customer_reviews.author: Craig in KC

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together but once together, it is very sturdy and well built. Really like the fact that you don't have hot spots---like you can with gas grills. Very pleased with grill and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Metz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grill
customer_reviews.text: Great grill, easy to assemble. Cooking is easy with no flair ups. Solid grill with quality construction Looking forward to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kool

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy that we bought this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is our first grill and we are extremely happy with it. It is very easy to assemble and get started with. Perfect for small family gatherings and parties. Heats up very well and evenly. It wont make a big mess and is very easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Anand

customer_reviews.title: Longer cooking time but worth it. No more flare ups!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill for the money. Have used as a smoker with great results as well as excellent for grilling various meats with kinimal flare ups. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna F

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy I purchased this grill! It’s was easy to put together and it cooks meat pretty fast. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: LookatMike

customer_reviews.title: Good grill but...
customer_reviews.text: I love char-broil product the only negative thing I have to say about this one is the paint cooked off the grate pretty quick. Still works just looks nasty though....
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J

customer_reviews.title: a great grill! so far I have cooked over 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: a great grill! so far I have cooked over 15 times in 25 days . I have yet to have a flare up yet even with greasy burgers, very even cooking. It realy does use less charcoal, I have yet to use more than 3/4 of chimney and still had enough time and temp to cook. I have to try smoking, but grilling is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C.

customer_reviews.title: terrific grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son! his other one was falling apart. love the no flare feature and the way the grill plate fits this grill. was going to buy a weber but found that this is built far better and very simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: barbara d.

customer_reviews.title: Vent Problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves it but the only problem is that the vents on the bottom do not shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dignan

customer_reviews.title: Char-Broil hit a home run with this one...
customer_reviews.text: YOU NEED ONE OF THESE GRILLS! I love my old Weber Kettle, but this thing is awesome! If you like charcoal grilling, order one today. Lots of grill for little money...you will be pleasantly surprised. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Bevo Stratum

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new grill. It's very easy to use and charcoal last forever in it. I've made many meals, and they've all turned out great. I did pick up a wireless thermometer to use while cooking, and it's been a great addition as well.
customer_reviews.author: j21blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Love it Great for grilling ribs
customer_reviews.text: Love it Great for grilling ribs. Will hold constant temp for up to 6 hours with one loading of charcoal. No flare up with high fat ground beef
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Routh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grill. Easy assembly. Get ready to use the least amount of charcoal ever, and it burns forever. Easy clean and maintenance. I got the cover as well, living in Georgia, I’ll need it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rocky Horror

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the High Class expensive grills. Char Broil has come a long way from the “Ordinary” grill. Will buy again. And, No l am not paid for my purchase, comments , or endorsing my grill.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Comeau

customer_reviews.title: Char-Broil TRU-Infrared Kettleman Charcoal Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size grill for our family. It was easy to set up and has plenty of room to cook a variety of foods.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Weber grills but when I saw this one it really caught my eye. I'm so happy with it, I bought for my husband for his birthday and he loves it. Food cooks faster and it just looks nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill I have ever had! Great grill marks and a perfect Rib-eye in 5 minutes. Or put one piece of charcoal all around the perimeter and slow cook chicken or ribs or even a small brisket.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Great Gril but needs handles
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this didn't get a four star is I think they should of added some handles or hanger spots to this grill for untensils. I love this grill and have used it several times with no flare up issues and even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Him
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this! Father’s Day gift for the townhome we just purchased
customer_reviews.author: heather stellon

customer_reviews.title: You will be extremely pleased with this grill!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like. A superior product. Beats all Weber kettle grills, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly pleased! Food tastes great (from meats to vegetables). Easy to use. Easy to clean. Easy to move. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johann's mom

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: grill is made of high quality material. it was so simple to assemble all parts were clearly marked!! I haven't grilled yet but I am sure this one is a good one.It is made much better than my weber.
customer_reviews.author: william harvey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bbq. it burns very hot because the coals ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bbq. it burns very hot because the coals are very close to the grill. I have not had any sticking problems or flames that were out of control. I love my new BBQ! Make sure you only use about half the amount of charcoal as you would wit a Webber. It's all you will need.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Go for the Weber...........
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016, and after the disappointment of it being too wobbly I have decided to sell it in a garage sale. It's not very sturdy and I wish I would have bought a weber.
customer_reviews.author: Daisycat

customer_reviews.title: Tru Grill
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grill. Cooks meat tenderly, and does not burn like other grills. Smoking on this grill is easy also. Grill grate is a little awkward to clean, but you just have to find the right brush.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill use it three times a week at least. Really holds heat and you really use a lot less charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: difficult to control temperature
customer_reviews.text: The area the charcoal sits in is directly beneath the grate. I tried using only 50 briquettes as instructed, and only using half the grill for charcoal makes one side really hot, the other side not so much. Maybe this takes practice, but I wouldn't spend the money on this grill if I had it to do again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this Grill. It takes a little getting used to when you first start cooking on it, but once you get the hang of it it's wonderful. It cooks extremely quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great basic charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price! Great basic charcoal grill. Easy to assemble (I did it myself and I don't know how to do anything - honestly). Good quality. Can fit enough stuff on it for 6-8 people. If you're looking for anything fancy, this isn't for you - but if you're looking for something to throw hot dogs and hamburgers on during the summer, it's just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Marra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together and gets hot quick
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together and gets hot quick! Caught me off guard how close the coals sit to the cooking grate but once adjusting for that it works great. The flareup control is awesome! No complaints for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice little grill! Be sure to use a nylon brush so you don't scratch up the grates. This summer I plan to try smoking on it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: What a good grill! Last two I've had were Webers and ...
customer_reviews.text: What a good grill! Last two I've had were Webers and this is so much better than them in just about every way. Higher quality, better design, etc.
customer_reviews.author: tvansky

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ. Get ready to cook a bit differently, but with great results.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome BBQ. Easy to assemble. Shipped fast. Different cooking process but flare up proof and design works well. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Best Charcoal Grill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend, and it was such an awesome purchase! I surprised him with it and he loves it. It is big enough to get a lot of grilling done, it wasn't that hard to put together and it makes for a great time of grilling any time!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Even cook
customer_reviews.text: The best charcoal grill I have ever used. This thing cooks very even and holds heat very well.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: ... but sadly I must admit this grill is the best charcoal grill I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Weber guy my whole life but sadly I must admit this grill is the best charcoal grill I have ever owned. If you read the manual and use the amount of coal it states to use (don't use alot) it cooks quickly and evenly. the addition of a grate holder, thermometer, easy ash removing, giant vent on the top and hinged lid make this the best grill out there in this price range. you would think the handle on the vent would get hot but it does not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vettle1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Really like the newer design of the cooking surface. Heat is distributed very evenly! Cooks faster also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wierd, but a great grill
customer_reviews.text: I love it I still get the heat and smoke, and can cook the Vegas easier!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, but we thought it was difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, but we thought it was difficult to assemble. Next time, I'll just get one already assembled from Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Another outstanding grill from Char-Broil
customer_reviews.text: Came to me in perfect condition, easy to assemble and the tru-infrared cooking system has ZERO flare ups! Best charcoal grill I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: BeattieW75

customer_reviews.title: It cooks very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grill last month for my son birthday. Him and his fiancé really likes it. He told me it is the best grill he has ever used It does cook the food quickly and successfully He was impressed and would defiantly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Simba

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it hasn’t been working properly. I’ve used it a total of 3 times and it doesn’t heat up enough. Food take very long to cook. I’ve tried all bbq cooking methods and followed the instructions that came with the grill. Unfortunately, I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Roman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this better than the Weber which it replaced. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is awesome! I love cooking outdoors & this grill works for what I like to cook on the grill. I do recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN J BECKER

customer_reviews.title: The quality is superb and assembled very easily (he said)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my son. The quality is superb and assembled very easily (he said). He has been grilling on it in NE Ohio all winter and he said it holds the heat better than any grill (gas), he's ever had. Just loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: danise shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Do not tighten bracket for catch tray
customer_reviews.text: Well the bracket for the catch tray broke off. Thread stripeed quick n broke off in nut. Had ta rig it up ta hold tray
customer_reviews.author: woman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! My husband loves it. Well made. Love it better than the Weber😊
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love the charcoal and wood chip flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use this grill more than my gas grill. Love the charcoal and wood chip flavor. Easy to clean with clear instructions. This kettle grill is fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: Great size Grill, family of 7
customer_reviews.text: The girl was very simple to put together. My daughters and I put it together for Father's Day. It was a fun surprise on a special day
customer_reviews.author: Erin Grider-Way

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Started grilling the next day...works as described! My wife and I really enjoy the Kettleman grill.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill...great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift, my son loves this grill, even better than he thought. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Doran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love how easy this makes charcoal grilling, it’s a must own for every household!

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions are easy to understand.
customer_reviews.text: The grill was put together with ease, all the parts fit together perfect. I am impressed with it's design and quality of materials.

customer_reviews.title: High quality BBQ
customer_reviews.text: A very well made bbq. It is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C Foote

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill/smoker I've owned so far. It gets super hot, and smokes meet evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S.

customer_reviews.title: This grill is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is ready much faster than my old weber. It takes a little get used to the charcoal being closer to the grill grate. I just love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Minkler

customer_reviews.title: So easy to cook on and you almost can not burn ...
customer_reviews.text: So easy to cook on and you almost can not burn food and the assembly very easy to follow and complete in 10 to 15 min. Also the different ways you can use it are very nice make sure you watch videos on you tube very good information.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for slow indirect cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Great grill and easy to assemble. I wish it had a better way to get all the ash to drop down into the pan. I have to shake the entire grill or use tongs to brush them down into the pan. Not a huge issue, but I noticed the Webber has a lever that does that. The hinged lid on the Kettleman along with the cooking grate are best features which to me were superior over the Webber. I've done roasts, whole chickens, ribs, steaks, shrimp and fish. It all comes out perfect. The grill is large enough that you cam move the coals to the outside edge and cook in the middle with indirect heat. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Lowes48Fan1

customer_reviews.title: Swak101
customer_reviews.text: Love these grill! Easy to put together. A lot of grilling surface. If you are looking to get a briquet style grill this is the one you should get. It is a also very well made. Sturdy grill.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R Swecker

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill. Amazingly easy to clean, cooks very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and the best looking BBQ Broiler ever
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and the best looking BBQ Broiler ever. Perfect for small family and small party. It is well designed with beautiful coverage that gives it the smoke effect when cooking. Love it...and thank you from Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Hall Ho

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and I feel it's a good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and I feel it's a good value for the price. Easy to assemble and works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.text: Been using this for grilling. Think I am going to try smoking with it at some point....once I get the appropriate pizza stone.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality..
customer_reviews.text: All well so far.. Used about half a dozen time.. no problem at all
customer_reviews.author: Yogita

customer_reviews.title: Temp Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: After reading instructions and using it dozens of times for grilling and smoking, there is no effective way to control the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Micus

product_meta.title: Char-Broil TRU-Infrared Kettleman Charcoal Grill, 22.5 Inch
product_meta.description: Style:Kettleman Charcoal GrillThe Char-Broil Charcoal Kettle Grill is everything you need for your basic backyard barbecue. It has 360 square inches of cooking space, on a porcelain-coated cooking grate. The porcelain enamel finish on the Char-Broil Charcoal Kettle Grill lid and bottom, add protection from the elements. The vented slide in ash catcher provides circulation for air and heat throughout the grill. For further control of the temperature and cooking, the charcoal grate is adjustable to bring the heat closer to the food or further away as needed when cooking. Two dampers easily control the heat. There are two wheels for easy mobility and a chrome-plated wire bottom shelf for stability and convenience. It's your basic kettle charcoal grill that you can count on to get your cooking job done.
feature_bullets: Charcoal kettle grill with a 360- square inch total cooking surface.
22.5-inch diameter porcelain-coated cooking grate keeps food on top and prevents flare-ups.
Hinged lid with mounted temperature gauge for ease of operation and temperature monitoring.
Removable ash bowl for simple clean-up; engineered to operate with less charcoal than others.
25.8-inches long x 25.8-inches wide x 38.8-inches high. 10-year limited warranty.
